column5: Any tips on fishing US side of LOTW? Staying at Ballard's for the fist time 6/21-6/26. Thinking about bringing in crawlers? Do we focus on flats or structure? Loos like the US side is one big lake, not much for islands, etc. Thanks for any help. ljcs789
I would probably pull spinners on the mud flats to start with. Worms leeches or minnows. If you find a big school start jigging. Good luck!
Thanks Tank. I was kind of leaning toward crawlers. What weight/color jigs would you recommend?
I like pink the best than gold and chartreuse is always good. If you pull spinners I like pink also and white second and gold 3rd.
Jigs I use mostly 3/8.sometimes 1/4. Bottom bouncers we use 3/4 and 1oz.
Just call Ballards a few days prior to arrival. They will tell you what's working from the Day Charters
